mapper.select: SELECT syscolumns.name FROM syscolumns,sysobjects,sysindexes,sysindexkeys WHERE syscolumns.id = object_id(#{tableName}) AND sysobjects.xtype = 'PK' AND sysobjects.parent_obj = syscolumns.id AND sysindexes.id = syscolumns.id AND sysobjects.name = sysindexes.name AND sysindexkeys.id = syscolumns.id AND sysindexkeys.indid = sysindexes.indid AND syscolumns.colid = sysindexkeys.colid

SELECT ACT_HI_BUSINESS_TABLE_INFO.business_table_name, ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS.pk FROM ACT_HI_BUSINESS_TABLE_INFO LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS ON ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS.business_table_id=ACT_HI_BUSINESS_TABLE_INFO.business_table_id WHERE ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS.process_instance_id=#{processInstanceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS( process_instance_id, business_table_id, pk,create_time ) VALUES ( #{processInstanceId}, #{tableId}, #{pk}, GETDATE() )
INSERT INTO ACT_HI_BUSINESSDATA( history_data, process_instance_id, task_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{historyData}, #{processInstanceId}, #{taskId}, GETDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT ACT_HI_BUSINESSDATA.history_data, ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS.pk, ACT_HI_BUSINESS_TABLE_INFO.business_table_name FROM ACT_HI_BUSINESSDATA LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS ON ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS.process_instance_id=ACT_HI_BUSINESSDATA.process_instance_id LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_BUSINESS_TABLE_INFO ON ACT_RE_PROCESSINSTANCE_BUSINESS.business_table_id=ACT_HI_BUSINESS_TABLE_INFO.business_table_id WHERE ACT_HI_BUSINESSDATA.process_instance_id=#{processInstanceId} AND ACT_HI_BUSINESSDATA.task_id=#{taskId}

SELECT act_hi_taskinst.ID_ AS task_id, act_hi_taskinst.NAME_ AS task_name, act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ AS process_instance_id, act_hi_taskinst.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS process_definition_id, act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ AS end_time, act_hi_varinst.TEXT_ AS task_info FROM act_hi_taskinst LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst ON act_hi_varinst.PROC_INST_ID_=act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ AND act_hi_varinst.NAME_=act_hi_taskinst.ID_ WHERE act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_=#{processInstanceId} AND act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL GROUP BY act_hi_taskinst.ID_ ORDER BY act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ DESC

SELECT act_hi_taskinst.ID_ AS task_id, act_hi_taskinst.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS process_definetion_id, act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ AS process_instance_id, act_hi_taskinst.NAME_ AS task_name, act_hi_taskinst.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS task_definetion_key, act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ AS end_time, act_hi_varinst1.TEXT_ AS business_info, act_hi_varinst2.TEXT_ AS task_info, act_hi_taskinst.ASSIGNEE_ AS assignee FROM act_hi_taskinst LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst AS act_hi_varinst1 ON act_hi_varinst1.PROC_INST_ID_ = act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT act_hi_taskinst.ID_, act_hi_varinst.TEXT_ FROM act_hi_taskinst LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst ON act_hi_varinst.NAME_ = act_hi_taskinst.ID_ WHERE act_hi_taskinst.ID_ =#{taskId} AND act_hi_varinst.NAME_ = act_hi_taskinst.ID_ ) AS act_hi_varinst2 ON act_hi_varinst2.ID_ = act_hi_taskinst.ID_ WHERE act_hi_taskinst.ID_ =#{taskId} AND act_hi_varinst1.NAME_ = "data" GROUP BY act_hi_taskinst.ID_ ORDER BY act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT act_hi_taskinst.ID_ AS task_id, act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ AS process_instance_id, act_hi_taskinst.START_TIME_ AS start_time, act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ AS end_time, act_hi_taskinst.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS process_definetion_id, act_hi_taskinst.NAME_ AS task_name, act_hi_varinst1.TEXT_ AS business_info, act_hi_varinst2.TEXT_ AS kind, act_re_deployment.NAME_ AS name FROM act_hi_taskinst LEFT JOIN ( SELECT act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ FROM act_hi_taskinst WHERE act_hi_taskinst.ASSIGNEE_=#{assignee} GROUP BY act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ ) tmp ON tmp.PROC_INST_ID_=act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst AS act_hi_varinst1 ON act_hi_varinst1.PROC_INST_ID_=act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst AS act_hi_varinst2 ON act_hi_varinst2.PROC_INST_ID_=act_hi_taskinst.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef ON act_hi_taskinst.PROC_DEF_ID_ = act_re_procdef.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_deployment ON act_re_procdef.DEPLOYMENT_ID_=act_re_deployment.ID_ WHERE act_hi_varinst1.NAME_="data" AND act_hi_varinst2.NAME_="kind" AND act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND tmp.PROC_INST_ID_ IS NOT NULL GROUP BY act_hi_taskinst.ID_ ORDER BY act_hi_taskinst.END_TIME_ DESC )temp GROUP BY temp.process_instance_id

SELECT act_ru_task.ID_ AS task_id, act_ru_task.PROC_INST_ID_ AS process_instance_id, act_ru_task.CREATE_TIME_ AS start_time, act_ru_task.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS process_definetion_id, act_ru_task.NAME_ AS task_name, act_ru_variable1.TEXT_ AS business_info, act_ru_variable2.TEXT_ AS kind, act_re_deployment.NAME_ AS name FROM act_ru_task LEFT JOIN act_ru_variable AS act_ru_variable1 ON act_ru_task.PROC_INST_ID_=act_ru_variable1.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_variable AS act_ru_variable2 ON act_ru_task.PROC_INST_ID_=act_ru_variable2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef ON act_ru_task.PROC_DEF_ID_ = act_re_procdef.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_deployment ON act_re_procdef.DEPLOYMENT_ID_=act_re_deployment.ID_ WHERE act_ru_task.ASSIGNEE_=#{assignee} AND act_ru_variable1.NAME_='data' AND act_ru_variable2.NAME_='kind' GROUP BY act_ru_task.ID_ ORDER BY act_ru_task.CREATE_TIME_ DESC

SELECT act_ru_task.ID_ AS task_id, act_ru_task.PROC_INST_ID_ AS process_instance_id, act_ru_task.CREATE_TIME_ AS start_time, act_ru_task.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS process_definetion_id, act_ru_task.NAME_ AS task_name, act_ru_variable1.TEXT_ AS business_info, act_ru_variable2.TEXT_ AS kind, act_re_deployment.NAME_ AS name FROM act_ru_task LEFT JOIN act_ru_variable AS act_ru_variable1 ON act_ru_task.PROC_INST_ID_=act_ru_variable1.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_variable AS act_ru_variable2 ON act_ru_task.PROC_INST_ID_=act_ru_variable2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef ON act_ru_task.PROC_DEF_ID_ = act_re_procdef.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_deployment ON act_re_procdef.DEPLOYMENT_ID_=act_re_deployment.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK ON ACT_RU_TASK.ID_=ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK.TASK_ID_ WHERE act_ru_task.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK.USER_ID_=#{userId} AND act_ru_variable1.NAME_='data' AND act_ru_variable2.NAME_='kind' GROUP BY act_ru_task.ID_ ORDER BY act_ru_task.CREATE_TIME_ DESC
SELECT ACT_RE_PROCDEF.ID_ AS process_definition_id, ACT_RE_PROCDEF.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS deploy_id, ACT_RE_PROCDEF.RESOURCE_NAME_ AS process_name FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF
SELECT ACT_USER_GROUP.user_id FROM ACT_USER_GROUP LEFT JOIN ACT_GROUP ON ACT_GROUP.group_id=ACT_USER_GROUP.group_id WHERE ACT_GROUP.group_name=REPLACE(#{groupName},' ','')
SELECT ACT_USER_GROUP.user_id FROM ACT_USER_GROUP LEFT JOIN ACT_GROUP ON ACT_GROUP.group_id=ACT_USER_GROUP.group_id WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ACT_GROUP.group_name,REPLACE(#{groupName},' ',''))

SELECT ACT_RE_PROCDEF.ID_ AS id, ACT_RE_PROCDEF.RESOURCE_NAME_ AS name FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT ON ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT.ID_=ACT_RE_PROCDEF.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ ORDER BY ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT.DEPLOY_TIME_ DESC

SELECT ACT_RU_TASK.ID_ AS task_id, ACT_RU_TASK.PROC_INST_ID_ AS process_instance_id, ACT_RU_TASK.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS process_definition_id, ACT_RU_VARIABLE.TEXT_ AS info FROM ACT_RU_TASK LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_VARIABLE ON ACT_RU_TASK.PROC_INST_ID_=ACT_RU_VARIABLE.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE ACT_RU_TASK.ID_=#{taskId} AND ACT_RU_VARIABLE.NAME_='data'
